title: Samsung Galaxy S6 to feature QHD display and Snapdragon 810 CPU? | Trusted Reviews
description: ![Samsung]()### Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how to enable it](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/how-to-enable-alexa-whisper-mode-echo-3607478 "Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how toenable it")  * This Samsung-chipped option is tipped to run a new Exynos 7420 processor, a64-bit chip which pairs four Cortex-A53 cores with four Cortex-A57 cores.Further features expected to be heading for the S6’s specs sheet includeGoogle’s new Android 5.0 Lollipop OS and a new, in-house developed LTE modem.Although the latest leaks have failed to point to when the Galaxy S6 willenter the realms of reality, previous reports have pointed to a MWC 2015unveiling for the future [iPhone6](https://www.trustedreviews.com/iphone-6-review) rival.**Read More:** [Sony Xperia Z4 releasedate](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/sony-xperia-z4-release-date-rumours-news-specs-and-price)
